thumb.title: Speakers Are Leaders Motivation Podcast. Harry Sardinas meets B2B sales expert Richard Blank.
thumb.description: Welcome to Speakers Are Leaders Motivation Channel with Harry Sardinas, where we bring you funny, edutaining videos and interviews to help you:Grow your business from the stage & build a powerful global brandOvercome stage fright & become a confident, charismatic speakerLearn from multimillionaires about their journey to success & how they made their first million5 Steps To Make Your First Million - Richard Blank and Harry Sardinas. Grow Your Business from the Stage & Build a Global BrandAre you ready to level up?Want to grow or start your business?Dream of making your first million?Ready to attract wealth & abundance into your life?https://youtu.be/t6w2jWDVWmkhttps://youtu.be/eNFDkn4FPRkhttps://youtu.be/tesjephpozYhttps://youtu.be/P_QP3IBOPI0https://youtu.be/a8hsxefGIFsRichard Blank hired bassist Garry Gary Beers of INXS. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ieGjN5H4xPQ
